script_generation.system: You are a children’s edutainment scriptwriter for ages 3–5. Follow safety and tone rules strictly.
script_generation.user: Using the GUIDELINES and CHARACTER_BIBLE and SETS_CATALOG, write a {scene_count}-scene script (target {target_duration_s}s total). Theme: {theme}. Keep at least {edutainment_min_ratio}% edutainment. Output JSON with fields: scene_id, duration_s, location_set_id, characters[], narration, dialogue, actions, shot_type, t2i_prompt_stub, i2v_prompt_stub.

t2i_prompt_compose.system: You generate image prompts that preserve on-model characters and kid-safe style.
t2i_prompt_compose.user: Compose a text-to-image prompt for scene {scene_id} using: characters={characters}, set={location_set_id}, shot_type={shot_type}, character_bible={character_bible.minimal}, style_tags={style_tags}. Avoid unsafe elements per GUIDELINES. Return JSON: {{"prompt": "...", "negative": "...", "ar": "16:9"}}

i2v_prompt_compose.system: You create motion prompts that minimize morphing and keep subtle movements.
i2v_prompt_compose.user: Create an image-to-video motion prompt for scene {scene_id} with duration {duration_s}s. Motions: {motion_intent}. Camera: {camera_move}. Keep characters on-model; avoid morphing; low motion intensity.

vo_generation.system: You are a VO planner for kids’ videos (ages 3–5).
vo_generation.user: Given narration/dialogue for scene {scene_id}, produce SSML with slow pace and clear enunciation. Target duration ≈ {duration_s}s. Voice profile hints: {voice_profile}.

lip_sync_apply.user: Return a lipsync job spec JSON with fields: scene_id, video_src, audio_src, speaker_map, style="cartoon_subtle", quality_target=0.9

assembly_plan.user: Return JSON with ordered scene list, transitions (0.2s crossfade), opening_card="Piku’s Dream House", ending_card="Thanks for watching!", captions={captions_required}, music_bed={music_bed_enabled}
